languages.text: Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever an ally attacks that enemy, they deal additional damage equal to the number of degraded defence stacks.
languages.original_text: Нанося противнику {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, персонаж накладывает на него +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффекта{/g} "брешь в обороне" за каждые 6 нанесенного урона. Атакуя эту же цель, союзник персонажа наносит ей дополнительный урон, равный числу уровней этого эффекта.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the character deals damage to an enemy, that enemy until end of combat gains 1 stack of the Degraded Defense effect for every 3 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever an ally attacks that enemy, they deal additional damage equal to the number of Degraded Defense.

Whenever the character deals damage to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence effect for every 3 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever an ally attacks that enemy, they deal additional damage equal to the number of degraded defence stacks.

Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever an ally attacks that enemy, they deal additional damage equal to the number of degraded defence stacks.

Whenever the character deals damage to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence effect for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever an ally attacks that enemy, they deal additional damage equal to the number of degraded defence stacks.

Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever an ally attacks that enemy, they deal additional damage equal to the number of degraded defence stacks.

languages.text: Cuando el personaje inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a un enemigo, el enemigo sufre +1 acumulación del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} defensa debilitada por cada 6 puntos de daño infligidos por el personaje. Cuando un aliado ataca al enemigo, inflige daño adicional igual al número de acumulaciones de defensa debilitada.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever an ally attacks that enemy, they deal additional damage equal to the number of degraded defence stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el personaje inflige daño a un enemigo, el enemigo sufre +1 acumulación del efecto defensa debilitada por cada 3 puntos de daño infligidos por el personaje. Cuando un aliado ataca al enemigo, inflige daño adicional igual al número de acumulaciones de defensa debilitada.

languages.text: このキャラクターが敵に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える時、このキャラクターが与えたダメージ6ごとに、+1スタックの防御劣化効果を付与する。味方がその敵を攻撃した時、防御劣化の累積数に等しい追加ダメージを与える。
languages.original_text: Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence effect for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever an ally attacks that enemy, they deal additional damage equal to the number of degraded defence stacks.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターが敵にダメージを与える時、このキャラクターが与えたダメージ3ごとに、+1スタックの防御劣化効果を付与する。味方がその敵を攻撃した時、防御劣化の累積数に等しい追加ダメージを与える。

languages.text: 每当角色对敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，此次攻击每造成6点伤害，目标就会获得1层“防御衰退”效果。每当盟友攻击受影响的敌人时，都会造成额外伤害，等同于目标的“防御衰退”层数。
languages.original_text: Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence effect for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever an ally attacks that enemy, they deal additional damage equal to the number of degraded defence stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当角色对敌人造成伤害时，此次攻击每造成3点伤害，目标就会获得一层“防御衰退”效果。每当盟友攻击受影响的敌人时，都会造成额外伤害，等同于目标的“防御衰退”层数。

languages.text: Wenn der Charakter einem Gegner {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt, wird dieser Gegner für jeweils 6 Schaden mit dem stapelbaren Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} "Zersetzte Verteidigung" belegt. Greift ein Verbündeter diesen Gegner an, erleidet er zusätzlichen Schaden in Höhe der Zahl der gestapelten Effekte.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever an ally attacks that enemy, they deal additional damage equal to the number of degraded defence stacks.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Charakter einem Gegner Schaden zufügt, erleidet dieser Gegner +1 Mal den aufaddierbaren Effekt „Zersetzte Verteidigung“ für je 3 Schaden, die der Charakter zugefügt hat. Wann immer ein Verbündeter diesen Gegner angreift, erleidet er zusätzlichen Schaden in Höhe der Anzahl der aufaddierten Effekte.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le personnage inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à un ennemi, ce dernier subit +1 cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} Défense dégradée par tranche de 6 points de dégâts qu'il subit. Lorsqu'un allié attaque cet ennemi, il lui inflige un nombre de points de dégâts supplémentaires égal au nombre de cumuls de l'effet Défense dégradée.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever an ally attacks that enemy, they deal additional damage equal to the number of degraded defence stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le personnage inflige des dégâts à un ennemi, celui-ci subit +1 cumul de l'effet Défense Dégradée par tranche de 3 points de dégâts qu'il inflige. Lorsqu'un allié attaque cet ennemi, il lui inflige un nombre de points de dégâts supplémentaires égal au nombre de cumuls de l'effet Défense Dégradée.

languages.text: Нанося противнику {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, персонаж накладывает на него +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффекта{/g} "брешь в обороне" за каждые 6 нанесенного урона. Атакуя эту же цель, союзник персонажа наносит ей дополнительный урон, равный числу уровней этого эффекта.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever an ally attacks that enemy, they deal additional damage equal to the number of degraded defence stacks.

traits.locale_text: Нанося противнику урон, персонаж накладывает на него +1 уровень эффекта "брешь в обороне" за каждые 3 нанесенного урона. Атакуя эту же цель, союзник персонажа наносит ей дополнительный урон, равный числу уровней этого эффекта.

Нанося противнику урон, персонаж накладывает на него +1 уровень эффекта "брешь в обороне" за каждые 3 нанесенного урона. Атакуя эту же цель, союзник персонажа наносит ей дополнительный урон, равный числу уровней этого эффекта.

languages.text: Karakter, bir düşmana {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verdiğinde o düşman, karakterin verdiği her 6 puanlık hasar için +1 zayıflayan savunma {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}etkisine{/g} maruz kalır. Bir dost birim, o düşmana saldırdığında zayıflayan savunma birikimine eşit miktarda ilave hasar verir.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever an ally attacks that enemy, they deal additional damage equal to the number of degraded defence stacks.
